Subject: Destron

 Another pod had closely followed megastrom. It was Guiledart. He was the 
right hand man of Magmatron in the battles on the planet God Bless. He had a 
beast mode of a triceretops. Is a supporter of reason and is a powerful 
tactician. His horns blasted out a powerful energy blast. He wasnt very fast 
but his intelegence made up fot it. he followed the signature of Megastrom. 
he came up to him and looked at the empty base. "You have been waiting how 
long?"
"About a cycle."
"Did you ever think they may not be there?"
"I never thought of it."
He scanned for Magma's signature and sent out a comm. "Master we are here to 
serve. me and Giledart are here to serve you once again. My brother Galvatron 
will be here as soon as he finishs his buisness. Please contact us."
